delete.if: DELETE act_permission,act_link,act_p_l FROM act_permission INNER JOIN act_p_l ON act_permission.id=act_p_l.p_id INNER JOIN act_link ON act_p_l.l_id=act_link.id WHERE act_permission.id=#{id}
DELETE act_permission,act_menu,act_p_m FROM act_permission INNER JOIN act_p_m ON act_permission.id=act_p_m.p_id INNER JOIN act_menu ON act_p_m.m_id=act_menu.id WHERE act_permission.id=#{id}

select.if: SELECT *,id m_id FROM act_menu INNER JOIN act_p_m ON act_p_m.m_id=act_menu.id WHERE act_p_m.p_id=#{id}
